clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text:
The following data is collected:

  • browser name and version
  • the user’s operating system
  • referrer URL

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: You are not being tracked
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: Our website only uses technically necessary cookies. Cookies are text files that are stored in the internet browser or by the internet browser on the user’s computer system. If a user visits a website, a cookie may be stored on the user’s operating system. This cookie contains a characteristic string of characters that enables the browser to be uniquely identified when the website is reopened.

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text: As a matter of principle, we collect and process personal data of our users only to the extent necessary to provide a functional website and our contents and services.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text: The personal data of the data subject will be deleted or blocked as soon as the purpose of the storage no longer applies.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: An anonymous payment method is offered
clauses.description: Some services allow payments via cryptocurrencies, so that users don’t need to reveal their identity to payment processors.
clauses.clause_text: CoinPayments (CoinPayments Inc., Hodltech OÜ, Tornimäe 5, 10145 Tallinn, Estland).

case.text: An anonymous payment method is offered

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text:
The following data is collected:

  • browser name and version
  • the user’s operating system
  • referrer URL
  • access date and time
  • IP address

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

clauses.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: However, for some processes, especially in connection with payment transactions, we depend on the services of third parties

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service
